Texto: 
hiv negative.
antibiotics.
streptococcus cultured from abscess aspiration
• multiple ring enhancing brain lesions
• enhancement of ventricular lining ependyma
• debris layering in ventricles
ruptured brain abscess and pyocephalus
• metastatic disease
• lymphoma
• ventriculitis, encephalitis, meningitis
51 year old man with headache and fever.  no heart disease or recent surgery nor instrumentation.
